it.polimi.se2018.util.Deserializer

Class MapsDeserializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2018.util.Deserializer.MapsDeserializer

  • public class MapsDeserializer
extends java.util.Observable
    class used to deserialize the maps from json file extends observable class for observer pattern

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapsDeserializer(java.lang.String pathname)
      class constructor: inizialize all the variable and the buffered reader for the json file

      class used to make the deserializing of the json file in a data structure that contains all the string with the information about Glasswindow

      method that notify to all observer class to build the cell of the maps
